Text.val: 05.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
02.04.2009 SH SCR14516 Major changes removed step 4 "UpdateCMCD"
05.02.2008 AK SCR13359 addedparameter Pi.GNRL_CODE when calling BCM016A
-- 1. Calculate total amount PN and cheques

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALC > 0 and INVO_INVOICEDOCTYPE = :4 for fetch only
